code: import{useMemo,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function isPrime(n){if(n<2)return false;const limit=Math.sqrt(n);for(let i=2;i<=limit;i++){if(n%i===0)return false;}return true;}export default function PrimeCalculator(){const[number,setNumber]=useState(1000);const primeCount=useMemo(()=>{let count=0;for(let i=2;i<number;i++){if(isPrime(i))count++;}return count;},[number]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:number,onChange:e=>setNumber(parseInt(e.target.value))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Liczb pierwszych: ",primeCount]})]});}
